Posts.Content: On May 18, 2007 12:00 AM Soul_Flower wrote: Am a breast cancer survivor currently taking Femara instead of Tamoxifen.  Would be interested in hearing from anyone who is also on Femara and the side effects encountered.  I am having trouble with arthritis and fatigue.  Have been on it 5 months. DianaI have just been taking it about six weeks. I just realized the joint pain I am having is related to the med. Not sure I can do it for five years. I had broken my ankle many years ago and sometimes I would know it was going to rain, but this is much worse.
